text: Nearctic (February 11, 1954 â€“ July 27, 1973) was a Canadian-bred Thoroughbred racehorse. He had his most successful season in racing at 4 years old, when he won nine races. Nearctic was retired to stand at stud at Windfields Farm in Canada where he became father of a Kentucky Derby winner and the Northern Dancer. He died at age 19 on July 27, 1973. == Other websites == * Nearctic's pedigree and stats Category:1954 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Thoroughbred racehorses
title: Nearctic (horse)
